trans-unit.source: Binds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> to the event handlers that implement the command.
trans-unit.target: 繫結 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 至實作此命令的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associates a command with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events which implement and determine the status of the command.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>產生關聯的命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> / <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> / <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>事件實作，並判斷命令的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events are raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>呼叫時， <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> / <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> / <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>命令目標會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the appropriate handlers are called.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目標有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令中，會呼叫適當的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the events are routed through the element tree until an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令中，事件會透過項目樹狀路由的項目直到<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>找到。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> has limited use with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> that is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>具有有限的使用與<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>不<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>。

trans-unit.source: This is because a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> binds the command to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> which listen to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> routed events which are raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> are called.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>繫結到命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>其中聆聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>路由事件的引發的時機<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>稱為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> on.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 以之為基礎的命令。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> on.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 以之為基礎的命令。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> event on the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> 上 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> and the specified <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> 事件處理常式，初始化 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> on.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 以之為基礎的命令。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> event on the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> 上 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute" /> event on the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute" /> 上 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> and the specified <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute" /> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" />，和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> 與 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> 事件處理常式，初始化 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 發生於與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 關聯命令啟動檢查以判斷命令是否可在命令目標上執行時。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>呼叫時，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>命令目標上引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目標有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>事件 （泡泡） 最多的項目樹狀目錄中搜尋項目，具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>與命令相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 反昇

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>.
trans-unit.target: 對應通道的事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> that maps an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs> handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Open%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>對應<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs>處理常式，以<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Open%2A>命令。

trans-unit.source: The following shows the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> which sets <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列示範<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>將<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 與這個繫結關聯的命令。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> that maps an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs> handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Open%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>對應<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs>處理常式，以<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Open%2A>命令。

trans-unit.source: The following shows the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> which sets <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列示範<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>將<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following shows the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which creates a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> when the command is executed.
trans-unit.target: 下列示範<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>建立<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>執行命令時。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: 與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 相關聯的命令執行時發生。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>執行時，便會產生<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>命令目標上的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>不處理事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>命令目標上引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the specific command, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目標有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>之特定命令，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that specific command the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>該特定命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>事件 （泡泡） 最多的項目樹狀目錄中搜尋項目，具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>與命令相關聯。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is not found, the command is not handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>找不到，未處理命令。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>.
trans-unit.target: 對應通道的事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> that maps an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs> handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Open%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>對應<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs>處理常式，以<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Open%2A>命令。

trans-unit.source: The following shows the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which creates a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> when the command is executed.
trans-unit.target: 下列示範<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>建立<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>執行命令時。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: 發生於與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 關聯命令啟動檢查以判斷命令是否可在目前的命令目標上執行時。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> event is raised on the command target if the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>呼叫時，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>命令目標會引發事件，如果命令目標有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令。

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 然後在<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>事件 （泡泡） 最多的項目樹狀目錄中搜尋項目，具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>與命令相關聯。

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: The corresponding bubbling event is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>.
trans-unit.target: 對應的反昇事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: 與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 相關聯的命令執行時發生。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>執行時，便會產生<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>命令目標上的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目標有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event tunnels down the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>事件通道向下搜尋項目，具有項目樹狀<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>與命令相關聯。

trans-unit.source: If the preview event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> event is raised on command target.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的預覽事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>引發的命令目標。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Tunneling
trans-unit.target: 通道

trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: The corresponding bubbling event is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>.
trans-unit.target: 對應的反昇事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>。
